import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default class NavBar extends Component { searchField = document.getElementById("searchBar"); constructor(){ super(); this.state ={ searchLink: "" } } handleOnChange = (event) => { this.setState({ searchLink: "/search/"+ event.target.value }) }; render() { return ( <>
